'''Now Let Time Resume''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to clear all sixteen [[Stone Pillar Seal]]s in Sumeru and defeat the [[Ruin Machines]] that are released. Completing this achievement is also necessary to finish the "[[Legends of the Stone Lock]]" [[World Quest]].
